hey donny!! so good to talk to you!! just wanted to let you know that the app, well, for lack of better words, itâ€™s a garbage fire. i wish i could rate it -69 stars. Let me tell you why:
1: hire a better graphic designer. the T in the logo is off centered compared to the 2020. i know you have enough money, with all of your shady hotels and restaurants, to hire even a monkey that could do a better job with no experience in ms paint than who ever designed that logo.
2: i donâ€™t feel comfortable giving you my phone number, but i gave you one that is supposed to go straight to santa clause. maybe you can ask for a better tan and hairline this december!!
3: if it was not evident by now, i am not trying to help you win the election. in fact, i really donâ€™t think that a measly little app will help improve your track record over the past... letâ€™s just stick to whatâ€™s happened in the last year: impeachment hearings, nearly sending the american people into another world war, assault allegations, assault of a minor, and ordering the police to shoot protestors.  now thatâ€™s only a few that i could remember. do you really think that this app is going to lead to voters to forget about those things? 
4: these rallies you are encouraging people to attend? will people be able to stand 6 feet apart, or are you at the point in the year where you donâ€™t care about your peopleâ€™s well-being anymore? did you ever care? or was it just about the power and money?
5: do the points that i can earn equal money? because if so, whoâ€™s money? if itâ€™s yours i would gladly take it off your hands. you have too much anyway.
6: the first article that appears when i log in to the app is that â€œBiden Opposition to Opening Economy Hurts Black-Owned Businessesâ€. now, i would think that sending the police to kill black people that run those businesses would hurt them more than a brief recession could. 

in conclusion, you cannot stop the will of the american people. the coming generations are prepared and ready to vote, protest, and revolutionize this country. you and your gang of boomers with osteoporosis and broken hips cannot stop us. good luck in the election ğŸ§šğŸ¼ğŸ’–ğŸ¤©youâ€™ll need it
